hero.headline: Your Local Property Maintenance Experts
hero.subheadline: Reliable and affordable services including carpentry, flooring, painting, tiling, garden maintenance and more.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At L.M.P Property Services, we take pride in offering a wide range of home improvement and maintenance solutions. Whether you need a single room refresh or a full property renovation, our skilled team is here to help. With free quotes, competitive pricing, and a commitment to quality, we’re your go-to local choice for all property work.

items.title: Carpentry
items.description: Custom woodwork, framing, door installation, skirting boards, and bespoke shelving tailored to your needs.

items.title: Tiling
items.description: Wall and floor tiling for kitchens, bathrooms, and living areas using high-quality materials and precise installation.

items.title: Painting & Decorating
items.description: Interior and exterior painting, feature walls, wallpapering, and decorative finishes to refresh any space.

items.title: Flat Pack Assembly
items.description: Fast, reliable flat pack furniture assembly for homes and offices—everything from wardrobes to kitchen cabinets.

items.title: Flooring
items.description: Expert installation of laminate, vinyl, hardwood, and carpet tile flooring with precise measurements and finishes.

items.title: Fascia & Soffits
items.description: Repair and replacement of fascia boards, soffits, and guttering to improve exterior appearance and longevity.

items.title: Plastering
items.description: Smooth skim finishes, patch repairs, drylining, and full-room re-plastering delivered by experienced plasterers.

items.title: Garden Maintenance
items.description: General tidy-ups, garden waste removal, fence repairs, and lawn care to keep your outdoor space looking its best.

items.title: Fully Insured & Qualified
items.description: All work is completed by experienced professionals backed by public liability insurance and verified training.

items.title: Free, No-Obligation Quotes
items.description: We provide clear, upfront pricing with no hidden fees. You know exactly what to expect before work begins.

items.title: Commitment to Quality
items.description: Our team takes pride in every project—attention to detail, reliable timelines, and a clean finish every time.

items.question: Do you offer free quotes?
items.answer: Yes. We visit your property, assess the work needed, and provide a detailed, no-obligation quote—always free of charge.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: We serve Bedfordshire and the surrounding counties within a 30-mile radius. If you’re outside that area, just get in touch to check availability.

items.question: Can you handle multiple small jobs?
items.answer: Absolutely. We frequently take on smaller tasks—call-outs, fixes, or one-off jobs—and we’ll bundle them into a single visit to save you time.

items.question: Are you fully insured?
items.answer: Yes. All of our craftsmen and subcontractors carry full public liability insurance, so you have peace of mind on every job.

contact.title: Request a Quote
contact.description: Call, message, or email us today to discuss your project. We’ll get back to you within 24 hours with a free estimate.
